!Marquez: Do not judge the Primeval Isle by only looking at this wharf. It is a dangerous place where primitive dinosaurs hide in the thick jungle, waiting for weak ones like you to wander by unawares! I've seen many like you who came to a bad end here! Exploring this island is not something to be done on a whim, mark my words. One day, when you are more experienced, you may be ready to explore its mysteries. (Only characters level 75 and above are permitted to take on this quest.)
